description: A collection of circles in two distinct formations: there is a circular formation in the top right corner of the picture and the other formation is shaped like three round formations connected in a line. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a purple triangle in the center of the top circular formation and a slightly lighter purple triangle on the right side of the bottom formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
